name: 2025 The 8th International Conference on Image and Graphics Processing
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1021-6), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, submitted for indexing by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
topics: Computer Graphics, Animation, Virtual Reality & Gaming
